segments.text: Mr . Crane ’ s office . Sandy speaking . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi , Sandy . It ’ s Walter Knight . I need to book some time with Mr . Crane .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Certainly , Mr . Knight . When would you like to meet with him ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you see what his schedule is like on Wednesday ?
segments.speaker: S2
